column2: This finely crafted medallion has been passed down through the Stormriders for generations. Preserved with tempestuous magical knowledge, it was a gift from the Mages of Hoeth long ago.
Astride his griffon, Sharpclaw, Althran swoops down on his chosen foe and cuts them down with talon and beak.
The Starblade like its lance variant is forged from the metal of a fallen star, the weapon's graceful lines belie the formidable power it grants its wielder.
This magical Armour of Fortune is an ancient family heirloom, and so beautifully crafted that the wearer's freedom of movement is completely unimpaired.
Just like his ancestors, Althran looks beyond Ulthuan borders to ensure no foe sets foot upon her shores.
The world descends into Chaos and she will never be tamed! But Ulthuan does not have to share this mortal fate.

With an ancestry dating back to the first Phoenix Kings, Althran's ancestors have led Asuryan armies all around the world, earning great glory and renown. Althran is determined to carry on this grand tradition, and will stop at nothing to protect his people and the domains of Ulthuan.
Capable of reactions so fast, Althran makes even the quickest Swordmaster of Hoeth look clumsy in comparison.
